|identification_symbol_4_label= }} The '20th Support Command' ('C'hemical,
'B'iological, 'R'adiological, 'N'uclear and high- yield 'E'xplosives or 'CBRNE')
is the United States Army's Chemical, Biological, Nuclear, Radiological and high-
yield explosives headquarters.
